name: Loot Box Waifus
description:
Do you like opening chests?
Do you like gaining gold?
Do you like collecting waifus?
Then this game is for you!

In Loot Box Waifus, you collect gold via clicking or passively from your waifus. You buy chests to gain more waifus.You can also use your gold for various upgrades.

Your waifus come in all shapes and sizes. You can collect golden, dark, metallic and retro versions of your waifus. Collecting a full set of retro waifus will grant you additional power.

But wait, there is more! Once you collect enough orbs, prestige to unlock even more upgrades. With your newly unlocked powers, open more chests, unlock more waifus!
